description: Open access policy for v0 public release. All layers accessible without authentication.

layer_policies.notes: Solar resource data is fully public.
Hazard constraint data is fully public.
Soil classification data is fully public.
Road network reference is fully public.
Grid infrastructure reference is public. Capacity data is link-out only.

usage_restrictions.description: Do not overlay or correlate with sensitive personal data.
Pack is for screening purposes only, not engineering design.

audit.notes: v0 public release - no audit logging required.

notes: This policy applies to the open v0 release. Future versions may introduce tiered access for premium layers.
